Evaluate.Description: This 8-Feet, wide opening, extra heavy duty aluminum folding access ladder "attic ladder" has a duty rating of 300-Pounds (type IA). Allows easy access into attics or storage areas in the garage. Counter balance mechanism eliminates sag and springiness. Aluminum will never splinter or crack. Adjustable-Feet for easy installation and correct fit. Heavy duty hinges ensure rigid structure. Lightweight easy to open and close, fully assembled ready to install. High quality door can be painted or stained. Comes with a push/pull rod.
Evaluate.Reason: An attic ladder is a tool used for home improvement and accessing storage spaces.

Evaluate.Description: Unlike most electric massagers, this Panasonic has a  telescoping handle that encourages effortless massage of  difficult-to-reach areas. The handle has two grips, so both hands can apply pressure  for a penetrating massage. The user can apply pressure to the lower  back, for instance, by gripping the handle with both hands and pulling  in the same manner as one would close a pair of pants. Retracted, the  handle measures 26 inches. Fully extended, it measures 42 inches. Each  grip pulls out separately. The massage head measures 5 by 2-1/2 inches  and has three large massaging nodes. The simple push of a button heats  the head, applying soothing warmth to a wide area. There's also a  high/low button to vary vibration intensity. The head also flexes to  adjust to body contours. The lightweight massager has a loop on the  handle for hanging on a hook or peg, and carries a one-year warranty  against defects.--Fred Brack
Evaluate.Reason: An electric massager is a health and personal care item.

Evaluate.Description: Multi-purpose rings, suited for swatches, samples, and bulky loose leaf material. Precision snap catch.
Evaluate.Reason: These rings can be used for organizing fabric swatches, which are often related to clothing design and jewelry making.

Evaluate.Description: Knowing the meaning of word parts can greatly expand children's vocabulary and help them figure out the meaning of words they have never seen or heard before. (Great for SAT and ACT preparation too!) This unique card deck presents 500 word parts and their meanings, along with two complete words and their definitions (1,000 in all), and a whimsical picture on one side. The other side is a flashcard to test the children's knowledge.500 Flash cards (3" x 4")500 Prefixes, suffixes, and stems1,000 words with definitionsHilarious illustrationsSturdy tin with handle
Evaluate.Reason: Flashcards are considered learning toys and educational materials.
